name: Ardent Censer
active: Frenzy: Healing or shielding an ally grants them 25% Attack Speed and 20 magic damage on-hit for 6 seconds.
tips: Ardent CenserIncreases allies Attack Speed +250 Max Health +35 Ability Power +20 Ability Haste +8% Heal and Shield StrengthArdent:  +5% Move Speed.Censer: When you heal or shield, an allied champion other than yourself, they gain 15-40% Attack Speed and their attacks deal 16-30 bonus magic damage.

2800


This item enhances your heals and shields, granting shielded allies increased attack speed and bonus magic damage on their attacks for a short duration.
Perfect for enchanter supports who want to protect and empower their carries when it matters most.
